title: The effects of six weeks of combined balance and plyometric training on postural control performance in elite badminton players: A pilot randomized, controlled study
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Luyu Zhang, Limingfei Zhou, Wangcheng Gong, Guole Jiang, Dapeng Bao, Brad Manor, Junhong Zhou
